kiro_integration.purpose: Extends Kiro's AI capabilities with ABAP-specific syntax understanding
kiro_integration.hero_story: Without MCP: Kiro would need extensive prompting to understand ABAP quirks. With MCP: Kiro has instant access to ABAP parsing tools and can analyze legacy code like an SAP expert.
usage_examples: Kiro uses parse_abap to extract business logic from cryptic ABAP code
Kiro uses detect_sap_patterns to identify standard SAP modules and BAPIs
Kiro uses generate_modern_equivalent to create TypeScript from ABAP
Kiro uses validate_business_logic to ensure transformations are correct
